title: Besieged Mariupol without power or water, says mayor, as Ukraine accuses Russia of blocking humanitarian corridor - CNN
content:
1. Besieged Mariupol without power or water, says mayor, as Ukraine accuses Russia of blocking humanitarian corridor  CNN
  2. Putin says Ukraine's future in doubt as cease-fires collapse  Yahoo News
  3. Russia fails to observe ceasefire in Mariupol and Volnovakha, say Ukrainian officials  Guardian News
  4. Russia invades Ukraine: Live updates  CNN
  5. The Latest: Limited Russian cease-fire revived in Ukraine; talks planned  WESH 2 Orlando
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Concern was mounting Sunday for the plight of civilians trapped in the besieged southeastern Ukrainian cities of Mariupol and Volnovakha, as well as in the capital, Kyiv, after three people were reported killed Sunday in a blast at an evacuation crossing point.
